channel.title: Cornell Agriculture and Life Sciences News

item.title: 2013: Images from a year to remember
item.description: Revisit a year of Cornell learning, discovery, engagement and events with a slide show created by University Photography and the Chronicle.

item.title: Willow workshop fires up Northeast bioenergy
item.description: A Dec. 18 workshop on willow biomass heating and biofuels attracted potential growers, manufacturers of harvesting and biomass heating equipment.

item.title: Cornell wins regional economic development funds
item.description: To create jobs and support economic growth, Cornell has been awarded funding for three projects in Ithaca and New York City.

item.title: Students devise new design, brand for Engaged Cornell center
item.description: A team of design and environmental analysis seniors has also developed communications and branding strategies to help the center raise its visibility on campus.

item.title: One alum's dream of 'giving back' to community
item.description: 'I want my students to go to college and serve their communities. That's my dream,' says high school teacher Yusuf Abdullah Muhammad, MPS '03.

item.title: 2012: Images from a year to remember
item.description: Revisit a year of Cornell learning, discovery, engagement and events with a slide show created by University Photography and the Chronicle.
